titleStmt.title: A true description of the passion of our Sauiour Iesus Christ as it was acted by the bloodie Iewes: and registred by the blessed Euangelists. In English meetre by Iohn Bullokar, Calend. Nouemb. 1618.
titleStmt.author: J. B. (John Bullokar)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Purslowe, for Samuel Rand, and are to be sold at his shop neere Holburne Bridge,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
